title: partymonsters_jvla
author: partymonsters_jvla
content: PARTY MONSTERS CLUB BOUNTY CAMPAIGN 100,000$ worth of $PMC allocated for the bounty campaign: - 65% for Tiktok, Reels and Shorts - 25% for Discord and Telegram - 10% for Reddit ------------------------------------------------------------------In order to qualify, you must: - follow us on Twitter, Instagram, Medium and join our Discord server and Telegram group. - submit your usernames from those platforms to bounty@partymonsterscoin.tech for verification with title “BOUNTY HUNTER”.------------------------------------------------------------------Tiktok - Instagram - Shorts - Twitter BOUNTY-------------------------------------------Reward: 150$ in $PMC per video.------------------------------------------------------------------Requirements: You must upload the video on all 4 platforms (TikTok, Shorts, Reels and Twitter)The videos MUST be HQThe videos must be informative and inviting, exciting------------------------------------------------------------------Rules: you're allowed to upload maximum 3 videos per week.------------------------------------------------------------------Example of a good video:*self or voice recording in an engaging video* a trucker put 150$ in Shiba Inu 2 years ago. He made 1.4 million USD from that investment. It's too late for those gains on shiba now, but Party Monsters Coin is just about to have a pre-sale and sell for VERY cheap.------------------------------------------------------------------DISCORD - TELEGRAM -------------------------------------------Reward: 15$ in $PMC for every active member you bring to our server/group (max 50 members per week)5$ in $PMC for every chatter about Party Monsters that you successfully create in other crypto groups (max 15 per week)------------------------------------------------------------------Requirements: Join other active crypto groups and talk about Party Monsters Coin projectEngage in conversations with users and introduce Party Monsters Club to them, pursue them to join our group/server------------------------------------------------------------------Reddit - Twitter-------------------------------------------This bounty is about:twitter and reddit comments (commenting on relevant tweets and posts)reddit posts (making posts in relevant subreddits)------------------------------------------------------------------Rewards: 5$ in $PMC for every Twitter/reddit comment (max 10 per week)10$ for every Reddit post (max 5 per week)------------------------------------------------------------------Requirements for:Twitter and reddit comments:must comment on relevant (crypto/money) tweets and postsyour comments must be visible and viewed/liked by others------------------------------------------------------------------Reddit posts:Posts must be made in crypto-relevant subredditsPosts must be informative and engagingPosts must wake interest in subreddit members------------------------------------------------------------------Bounty campaign is active from 1st May to 1st June. 2023.Report to us via e-mail (bounty@partymonsterscoin.tech) every 7 days what's been done.Thank you all for reading, and good luck
